Trigger.Name: Prismatic Deception
Trigger.Description:
This trigger calls out Prismatic Deception safe spots when the casts of Blasting Zone start on the enemy list. The calls by default are North, Northeast, East, Southeast, obviously the cardinal/intercardinal direction opposite of what the trigger calls will be safe too. If you prefer, you can change the things the TTS actions call in the Trigger Actions tab of the this trigger.
Version History: v1.4: Public Release v1.5: Rewrote part of this trigger to have fewer moving parts since it wasn't executing consistently v1.6: I swear to god this thing works now

Trigger.Name: Inception (SuperJump + CC Baits) - True Heart Trigger

Action.Description: Save your own clone's ID in variable cloneID
Fate Calibration Header (Move me!) | Toggle to enable/disable images
Set FateAB variable for Fate Projection
Set FateAB variable for Fate Projection
Sort clonelist after list has been made
Fire Clone TTS Trigger if variables are sufficient
Fire Clone Image Trigger if variables are sufficient
Unset obsolete scalar variables at Fate Calibration cast finish
Unset clonelist at Fate Calibration cast finish
Deactivate images at real Sacrament/Radiant Sacrament

Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:5174:Lyon The Beast King starts using Twin Agonies on (?<player>(?<name>[\w-']+) [\w-']+)\.

Trigger.Name: Magitek Missilles
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:51FF:4[Tt]h Legion Helldiver starts using Magitek Missiles on (?<player>(?<name>[\w-']+) [\w-']+)\.

Trigger.Name: Extreme Caution
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Extreme Caution from (.*?)? for (?<duration>[0-9]{2})\.00 Seconds
